selectedVerses.text: And he defeated Moab and he measured them with a line, making them lie down on the ground. Two lines he measured to be put to death, and one full line to be spared. And the Moabites became servants to David and brought tribute.
And Asa went out to meet him, and they drew up their lines of battle in the Valley of Zephathah at Mareshah.
The lines have fallen for me in pleasant places; indeed, I have a beautiful inheritance.
